**水晶板甲**（crystal plate mail）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[玻璃](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%BB%E7%92%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玻璃 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.3 xNetHack](#xNetHack)
  - [5.4 notdNetHack](#notdNetHack)
  - [5.5 EvilHack](#EvilHack)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[弗拉德之塔](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%97%E6%8B%89%E5%BE%B7%E4%B9%8B%E5%A1%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "弗拉德之塔 (page does not exist)")的中层的一个小隔间内必定会生成一件水晶板甲。

生成时目标[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")为-2或更好的[雇佣兵](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E4%BD%A3%E5%85%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雇佣兵 (page does not exist)")（例如[岩德军团](/index.php?title=%E5%B2%A9%E5%BE%B7%E5%86%9B%E5%9B%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "岩德军团 (page does not exist)")[中尉](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "中尉 (page does not exist)")和[警卫员](/index.php?title=%E8%AD%A6%E5%8D%AB%E5%91%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "警卫员 (page does not exist)")队长）有4⁄25的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件水晶板甲[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")和[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有1⁄62（约1.61%）的概率获得一件水晶板甲[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## 描述

穿戴时，水晶板甲能提供7点基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成和[MC2](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔 (page does not exist)")，与[板甲](/wiki/%E6%9D%BF%E7%94%B2 "板甲")类似。由于由玻璃制成，水晶板甲不会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")，且免疫[侵蚀损伤](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80%E6%8D%9F%E4%BC%A4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侵蚀损伤 (page does not exist)")，但属于[易碎](/index.php?title=%E6%98%93%E7%A2%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "易碎 (page does not exist)")物品，在未被穿戴时容易被摧毁。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[3.7.0](/wiki/3.7.0 "3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit e9c58c2f](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/e9c58c2fe4277fc64433df3c9a2e8d954fd1d16a)，现在玻璃材料的防具被冲击破坏时不会立即被摧毁，而是受到一层破裂损伤，其机制和其他[侵蚀损伤](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80%E6%8D%9F%E4%BC%A4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侵蚀损伤 (page does not exist)")相同。当玻璃防具的破裂损伤达到3层后，再次遭到冲击就会被完全摧毁。

根据[commit 5e572d3d](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/5e572d3d5f2581d14c29bd0071c6be0d7fbdce5e)，现在水晶板甲的重量下降至415。

## 策略

水晶板甲的基础AC在所有不阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")的防具中排第二，仅次于[龙鳞甲](/wiki/%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "龙鳞甲")，但由于过高的重量，其实用性很低：大部分施法者角色的起始[力量](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力量 (page does not exist)")都不高，难以承担水晶板甲的重量。一般等到角色锻炼出足以携带水晶板甲的力量时，他们通常：（1）已经拥有了龙鳞甲，或（2）已经把AC降到足够低，以至于不需要水晶板甲的额外防护了。

即使是高力量值的玩家，也更偏好在获得龙鳞甲之前选择[矮人秘银胶衣](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E7%A7%98%E9%93%B6%E8%83%B6%E8%A1%A3 "矮人秘银胶衣")或[精灵秘银胶衣](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E7%A7%98%E9%93%B6%E8%83%B6%E8%A1%A3 "精灵秘银胶衣")。秘银胶衣可以省下强壮角色至少1⁄3的[携带容量](/index.php?title=%E6%90%BA%E5%B8%A6%E5%AE%B9%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "携带容量 (page does not exist)")（300 [aum](/index.php?title=Aum/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Aum/zh-CN (page does not exist)")）且提供的基础AC只少1～2点。不使用金属防具的角色，也可考虑[嵌皮甲](/wiki/%E5%B5%8C%E7%9A%AE%E7%94%B2 "嵌皮甲")。

水晶板甲是[易碎](/index.php?title=%E6%98%93%E7%A2%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "易碎 (page does not exist)")的，因此在未穿戴时会被打碎，务必小心处理——在售卖水晶板甲的商店里使用[力冲击](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E5%86%B2%E5%87%BB%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E4%B9%A6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力冲击魔法书 (page does not exist)")或[冲击魔杖](/index.php?title=%E5%86%B2%E5%87%BB%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "冲击魔杖 (page does not exist)")时要尤其小心，因为对大多数角色而言，前期游戏中一旦打碎了水晶板甲，想要付清[店主](/index.php?title=%E5%BA%97%E4%B8%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "店主 (page does not exist)")的欠款并不容易。

## 历史

水晶板甲最初于[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")加入游戏。

## Variants

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") get a weight reduction for any body armor heavier than [studded leather armor](/wiki/Studded_leather_armor "Studded leather armor"), making crystal plate mail a more feasible option for them in particular.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), crystal plate mail grants 3 AC and 3 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") while worn, but does not confer magic cancellation, and its weight is reduced to 170 aum. For [Samurai](/wiki/Samurai "Samurai"), crystal plate mail is known as **"jade o-yoroi"**.

Crystal plate mail can safely be enchanted to +7 and adds its full enchantment as a bonus to both AC and DR, rather than half of its enchantment to each as with other armor - dNetHack also introduces crystal armor for each part of the body, which has the same traits.

Crystal plate mail can be found in the second-to-last floor of the [Windowless Tower](/wiki/Windowless_Tower "Windowless Tower").

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), while crystal plate mail is not changed directly, armor with glass as its base material can be shatter-proofed through the usual methods of erosion-proofing armor (e.g. reading a [scroll of enchant armor](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_armor "Scroll of enchant armor") while confused). Worn armor is also subject to a 1⁄4 weight reduction, making crystal plate mail slightly more viable.

Dragon scale mail is replaced with dragon-scaled armor in xNetHack, significantly changing which armor is viable or even "optimal" for a given character; crystal plate mail is likely to be overlooked in favor of comparable mail with a lighter material, such as [bone](/wiki/Bone "Bone") or [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril"), for use with dragon scales.

### notdNetHack

In [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), in addition to dNetHack details, [Ymir](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\)#Ymir.2C_Lord_of_the_Grassless_Gap "Spirits (dNetHack)") is generated with a +10 [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") set of crystal plate mail known as the [Plates of the Near Void](/wiki/Plates_of_the_Near_Void "Plates of the Near Void") when summoned by an [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), crystal plate mail is changed considerably: Its weight is reduced to 150 aum, and its base material is [gemstone](/wiki/Gemstone "Gemstone") instead of glass, making it immune to erosion (which includes shattering). It is also immune to disintegration and the revamped [destroy armor](/wiki/Destroy_armor_\(monster_spell\) "Destroy armor (monster spell)") monster spell, which can now erode armor even if the target has [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") or the armor is made of an inherently erosionproof material.

EvilHack applies a spellcasting penalty to all roles for any worn body armor similar to [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), with crystal plate mail as the sole exception. Dragon scale mail is replaced with dragon-scaled armor in EvilHack as well, and crystal plate mail is among the most enticing armor to merge dragon scales into.

High-ranking mercenaries of a [race](/wiki/Racial_monster "Racial monster") that can wear body armor have a chance of generating with crystal plate mail as usual. The [Paladin](/wiki/Paladin_\(monster\) "Paladin (monster)"), the [Infidel](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel") [quest nemesis](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis"), will always generate with crystal plate mail.

The [Armor of Retribution](/wiki/Armor_of_Retribution "Armor of Retribution") is an intelligent artifact set of crystal plate mail that can only be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining [The Sword of Annihilation](/wiki/The_Sword_of_Annihilation "The Sword of Annihilation") and [Ashmar](/wiki/Ashmar "Ashmar").

水晶板甲（crystal plate mail）是NetHack中的一种铠甲类防具。它由玻璃制成。

生成

弗拉德之塔的中层的一个小隔间内必定会生成一件水晶板甲。

生成时目标AC为-2或更好的雇佣兵（例如岩德军团中尉和警卫员队长）有4⁄25的概率获得一件水晶板甲[1]。

野蛮人、骑士、牧师和女武神职业的玩家怪物有1⁄62（约1.61%）的概率获得一件水晶板甲[2][3][4][5]。

描述

穿戴时，水晶板甲能提供7点基础AC加成和MC2，与板甲类似。由于由玻璃制成，水晶板甲不会阻碍施法，且免疫侵蚀损伤，但属于易碎物品，在未被穿戴时容易被摧毁。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

根据commit e9c58c2f，现在玻璃材料的防具被冲击破坏时不会立即被摧毁，而是受到一层破裂损伤，其机制和其他侵蚀损伤相同。当玻璃防具的破裂损伤达到3层后，再次遭到冲击就会被完全摧毁。

根据commit 5e572d3d，现在水晶板甲的重量下降至415。

策略

水晶板甲的基础AC在所有不阻碍施法的防具中排第二，仅次于龙鳞甲，但由于过高的重量，其实用性很低：大部分施法者角色的起始力量都不高，难以承担水晶板甲的重量。一般等到角色锻炼出足以携带水晶板甲的力量时，他们通常：（1）已经拥有了龙鳞甲，或（2）已经把AC降到足够低，以至于不需要水晶板甲的额外防护了。

即使是高力量值的玩家，也更偏好在获得龙鳞甲之前选择矮人秘银胶衣或精灵秘银胶衣。秘银胶衣可以省下强壮角色至少1⁄3的携带容量（300 aum）且提供的基础AC只少1～2点。不使用金属防具的角色，也可考虑嵌皮甲。

水晶板甲是易碎的，因此在未穿戴时会被打碎，务必小心处理——在售卖水晶板甲的商店里使用力冲击或冲击魔杖时要尤其小心，因为对大多数角色而言，前期游戏中一旦打碎了水晶板甲，想要付清店主的欠款并不容易。

历史

水晶板甲最初于NetHack 1.3d加入游戏。

Variants

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, Knights get a weight reduction for any body armor heavier than studded leather armor, making crystal plate mail a more feasible option for them in particular.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, crystal plate mail grants 3 AC and 3 DR while worn, but does not confer magic cancellation, and its weight is reduced to 170 aum. For Samurai, crystal plate mail is known as "jade o-yoroi".

Crystal plate mail can safely be enchanted to +7 and adds its full enchantment as a bonus to both AC and DR, rather than half of its enchantment to each as with other armor - dNetHack also introduces crystal armor for each part of the body, which has the same traits.

Crystal plate mail can be found in the second-to-last floor of the Windowless Tower.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, while crystal plate mail is not changed directly, armor with glass as its base material can be shatter-proofed through the usual methods of erosion-proofing armor (e.g. reading a scroll of enchant armor while confused). Worn armor is also subject to a 1⁄4 weight reduction, making crystal plate mail slightly more viable.

Dragon scale mail is replaced with dragon-scaled armor in xNetHack, significantly changing which armor is viable or even "optimal" for a given character; crystal plate mail is likely to be overlooked in favor of comparable mail with a lighter material, such as bone or mithril, for use with dragon scales.

notdNetHack

In notdNetHack, in addition to dNetHack details, Ymir is generated with a +10 artifact set of crystal plate mail known as the Plates of the Near Void when summoned by an Illithanachronounbinder.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, crystal plate mail is changed considerably: Its weight is reduced to 150 aum, and its base material is gemstone instead of glass, making it immune to erosion (which includes shattering). It is also immune to disintegration and the revamped destroy armor monster spell, which can now erode armor even if the target has magic resistance or the armor is made of an inherently erosionproof material.

EvilHack applies a spellcasting penalty to all roles for any worn body armor similar to SLASH'EM, with crystal plate mail as the sole exception. Dragon scale mail is replaced with dragon-scaled armor in EvilHack as well, and crystal plate mail is among the most enticing armor to merge dragon scales into.

High-ranking mercenaries of a race that can wear body armor have a chance of generating with crystal plate mail as usual. The Paladin, the Infidel quest nemesis, will always generate with crystal plate mail.

The Armor of Retribution is an intelligent artifact set of crystal plate mail that can only be created at a forge by combining The Sword of Annihilation and Ashmar.

  • [[销魔|MC2]]
|cost=820 |weight=450 |material=玻璃 }} '''水晶板甲'''（crystal plate mail）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[铠甲]]类[[防具]]。它由[[玻璃]]制成。 == 生成 == [[弗拉德之塔]]的中层的一个小隔间内必定会生成一件水晶板甲。 生成时目标{{cnlink|AC}}为-2或更好的[[雇佣兵]]（例如[[岩德军团]][[中尉]]和[[警卫员]]队长）有{{frac|4|25}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一件水晶板甲{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|622|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 [[野蛮人（玩家怪物）|野蛮人]]、[[骑士（玩家怪物）|骑士]]、[[牧师（玩家怪物）|牧师]]和[[女武神（玩家怪物）|女武神]]职业的[[玩家怪物]]有{{frac|62}}（约1.61%）的概率获得一件水晶板甲{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|174|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|201|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|215|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|242|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 穿戴时，水晶板甲能提供7点基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成和[[销魔|MC2]]，与[[板甲]]类似。由于由玻璃制成，水晶板甲不会阻碍[[施法]]，且免疫[[侵蚀损伤]]，但属于[[易碎]]物品，在未被穿戴时容易被摧毁。 {{upcoming/zh-CN|3.7.0|根据{{commit|e9c58c2fe4277fc64433df3c9a2e8d954fd1d16a}}，现在玻璃材料的防具被冲击破坏时不会立即被摧毁，而是受到一层破裂损伤，其机制和其他[[侵蚀损伤]]相同。当玻璃防具的破裂损伤达到3层后，再次遭到冲击就会被完全摧毁。 根据{{commit|5e572d3d5f2581d14c29bd0071c6be0d7fbdce5e}}，现在水晶板甲的重量下降至415。}} == 策略 == 水晶板甲的基础AC在所有不阻碍[[施法]]的防具中排第二，仅次于[[龙鳞甲]]，但由于过高的重量，其实用性很低：大部分施法者角色的起始[[力量]]都不高，难以承担水晶板甲的重量。一般等到角色锻炼出足以携带水晶板甲的力量时，他们通常：（1）已经拥有了龙鳞甲，或（2）已经把AC降到足够低，以至于不需要水晶板甲的额外防护了。 即使是高力量值的玩家，也更偏好在获得龙鳞甲之前选择[[矮人秘银胶衣]]或[[精灵秘银胶衣]]。秘银胶衣可以省下强壮角色至少{{frac|3}}的[[携带容量]]（300 {{cnlink|aum}}）且提供的基础AC只少1{{波浪线}}2点。不使用金属防具的角色，也可考虑[[嵌皮甲]]。 水晶板甲是[[易碎]]的，因此在未穿戴时会被打碎，务必小心处理——在售卖水晶板甲的商店里使用{{+ of/zh-CN|力冲击}}或[[冲击魔杖]]时要尤其小心，因为对大多数角色而言，前期游戏中一旦打碎了水晶板甲，想要付清[[店主]]的欠款并不容易。 == 历史 == 水晶板甲最初于[[NetHack 1.3d]]加入游戏。 ==Variants== ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], [[Knight]]s get a weight reduction for any body armor heavier than [[studded leather armor]], making crystal plate mail a more feasible option for them in particular. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], crystal plate mail grants 3 AC and 3 [[DR]] while worn, but does not confer magic cancellation, and its weight is reduced to 170 aum. For [[Samurai]], crystal plate mail is known as '''"jade o-yoroi"'''. Crystal plate mail can safely be enchanted to +7 and adds its full enchantment as a bonus to both AC and DR, rather than half of its enchantment to each as with other armor - dNetHack also introduces crystal armor for each part of the body, which has the same traits. Crystal plate mail can be found in the second-to-last floor of the [[Windowless Tower]]. ===xNetHack=== In [[xNetHack]], while crystal plate mail is not changed directly, armor with glass as its base material can be shatter-proofed through the usual methods of erosion-proofing armor (e.g. reading a [[scroll of enchant armor]] while confused). Worn armor is also subject to a {{frac|4}} weight reduction, making crystal plate mail slightly more viable. Dragon scale mail is replaced with dragon-scaled armor in xNetHack, significantly changing which armor is viable or even "optimal" for a given character; crystal plate mail is likely to be overlooked in favor of comparable mail with a lighter material, such as [[bone]] or [[mithril]], for use with dragon scales. ===notdNetHack=== In [[notdNetHack]], in addition to dNetHack details, [[Spirits (dNetHack)#Ymir, Lord of the Grassless Gap|Ymir]] is generated with a +10 [[artifact]] set of crystal plate mail known as the [[Plates of the Near Void]] when summoned by an [[Illithanachronounbinder]]. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], crystal plate mail is changed considerably: Its weight is reduced to 150 aum, and its base material is [[gemstone]] instead of glass, making it immune to erosion (which includes shattering). It is also immune to disintegration and the revamped [[destroy armor (monster spell)|destroy armor]] monster spell, which can now erode armor even if the target has [[magic resistance]] or the armor is made of an inherently erosionproof material. EvilHack applies a spellcasting penalty to all roles for any worn body armor similar to [[SLASH'EM]], with crystal plate mail as the sole exception. Dragon scale mail is replaced with dragon-scaled armor in EvilHack as well, and crystal plate mail is among the most enticing armor to merge dragon scales into. High-ranking mercenaries of a [[Racial monster|race]] that can wear body armor have a chance of generating with crystal plate mail as usual. The [[Paladin (monster)|Paladin]], the [[Infidel]] [[quest nemesis]], will always generate with crystal plate mail. The [[Armor of Retribution]] is an intelligent artifact set of crystal plate mail that can only be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining [[The Sword of Annihilation]] and [[Ashmar]]. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Body armor/zh-CN|SHUIJINGBANJIA]]
